artofillusion.boundingsphere - package artofillusion.boundingsphere
 

B

BoundingSphere - Class in artofillusion.boundingsphere
BoundingSphere is an enclosing volume to a set of points in 3D-space.

Define an empty BoundingSphere

Define a BoundingSphere

Calculate a bounding sphere for a set of vertices.

Calculate a bounding sphere for an object on in a scene.

Calculate a bounding sphere for a group of objects

Calculate a boundincg sphere for an object on in a scene.

Calculates the "box center" (AABB center) for a set of vertices.

G

GeoFit - Class in artofillusion.boundingsphere
GeoFit is an algorithm to define a minimal bounding sphere for a set of points in 3D-space, applying a few simple geometrical rules.
GeoFit() - Constructor for class artofillusion.boundingsphere.GeoFit
Create the solver.

M

metatext - Variable in class artofillusion.boundingsphere.BoundingSphere
The class, that creates the sphere, may write additional information here or the class using it may store data.
mode(int) - Method in class artofillusion.boundingsphere.Ritter
Set wether to use the first or the last found of similar points in 'pass1'.
mode() - Method in class artofillusion.boundingsphere.Ritter

Ritter - Class in artofillusion.boundingsphere
Ritter2 is an implementation of "An efficient bounding sphere V.2" by Jack Ritter 1990, as described in the published document on www.researchgate.net.
Ritter() - Constructor for class artofillusion.boundingsphere.Ritter
